element.name: NewMessage
element.descr: NewMessage sets up an event record including the new fields and calls Receiver.HandleEvent to handle the event. Message returns nil if Receiver is nil, or if the event is not handled successfully.

element.name: GetVideoBuffer
element.short: returns a Pointer to the Actual Videobuffer

element.name: TView
element.short: TView (FV) is the base-class for all visual components

element.name: TView.MakeGlobal
element.short: MakeGlobal calculates the global coordinates for given local coordiantes

element.name: TGroup
element.short: TGroup is a Container for TView-Components
element.descr: instead of a Buffer like in FV it now has a Canvas-Property on which child-TView-Components can draw on.
